{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3398598,"name":"Dalton","username":"daltzsmith","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daltzsmith/{size}/206287_2.png","created_at":"2024-06-13T20:49:55.169Z","cooked":"

Here at CTR Electronics we rely heavily on community feedback to improve our products. In fact, many of Phoenix’s current features are in direct response to such feedback.
Thank you to everyone who has provided feedback over the years and thank you to everyone who continues to use CTRE products and Phoenix software.

We’ve put together a survey of questions that cover Phoenix, Tuner X, and our Documentation. Our goal is to get feedback on your current experience with Phoenix, understand community needs, and inform the direction of our development as we go through the off-season.

The survey has a few sections and should take 10-15 minutes to complete.
Thank you in advance for taking the time to share your thoughts!

Survey: 2024 Phoenix Feedback
